text: SELECT “name_firstname’, “name_surname’, ‘exam_mark’ FROM Enrollment, Course, Student WHERE Enrollment.course_id=Course.id AND Enrollment.student_id=Student.id AND Course. title="CS-1Q" ORDER BY Student.name_firstname, Student.name_surname ASC = CHI name_frsiname - name_sumame exam_mark ~ e 2 Jane Jones E2) 3 saly Saunders 7 4 sam smith £
